            A Promise of Bliss and Progress
Watch how life unfolds in a laid-back comunity and discover the splendor that less among the rising terrains, Evergreen Estates is the newest master-planned community in the flourishing municipality of San Mateo, Rizal where you can delight in an overlooking view of the region, wallow in the refreshing winds and invest in a rejuvenating retreat of your own.

Thrive in an uphill community

Settle in the thriving East, San Mateo is a first-class municipality and one of the fastest-growing area in the province of Rizal. it is surrounded by three major cities: Marikina, Antipolo and Quezon City.

Shop, dine and enjoy anything without hassle as major commercial areas including shopping malls, markets, hospitals, churches, banks, schools are all within the distance of just 7km, from Evergreen Estates Brgy. Silangan, San Mateo, Rizal.

Evergreen Estates is approximately 24 km. away from Metro Manila via Quezon Avenue and 16 km, from Pasig via Eulogo Amang Rodriguez avenue. Driving and commuting to Evergreen Estates is a breeze with ready means of public transport all over the area like jeepneys, buses and the LRT-2 station. 

Make Evergreen Estates your most winning investment in the East.


  Dreamhouse
  Exclusive Subdivision

  San Mateo
  Sta.Lucia Land Inc.

minimum Lot size 120 and 150 sqm.

                            <div class="ListingCell-shortDescription ">
             Located in a flood-free, quiet neighborhood in Soldiers Hills Village in Barangay Putatan, Muntinlupa City. The lot, which has an old two-bedroom bungalow, is a mere five to 10 minutes from Filinvest City (Muntinlupas central business district) and Ayala South Park Mall, and 10 to 15 minutes from Alabang Town Center via CARES (City Alternative Route and Exit System). Skyway and SLEx are just nearby, making the property easily accessible.

 Ideal for townhouses/apartments that provide passive income, or simply ones ``dream house. The property is near the church, schools, wet markets, grocery stores, shops and hospitals. Utilities, internet service (Globe, PLDT and Converge) and cable TV are available in the neighborhood.

                            <div class="ListingCell-shortDescription ">
            These Lazi ocean view lots are simply breathtaking. Every single lot in this community has a beautiful, panoramic view of the sea that will blow you away. There are various lot sizes to choose from and at a good price per sqm, we are sure you will be able to find that special one that will match your budget. Located in Lazi, Siquijor, this project will be a satellite community of Metro Dumaguete Estates Gabayan Riviera dive resort.
All lot owners will be given the opportunity to avail of the resort facilities for small and reasonable monthly membership fee. You will have the peace and quiet of a private community with a great view, then only a short 5-minute drive away, you will be on the ocean and enjoying the luxurious amenities of a 4 star resort. The amenities in this resort will include a pool, restaurant, dock, spa, gym and a dive shop.
The community itself will have access to primary power, water distribution system, and hard packed gravel road. The barangay road is paved right to the property.
This is an opportunity that you will fall in love with as soon as you see it all with your own eyes!
Lazi Ocean View Lots Details:
Price  starting at 822,000 Php (Priced at P2,000/sqm)
Lot Sizes  411 sqm (note you can add two lots to make a bigger size depending on availability)
All closing costs extra
2-year financing available with 50% down payment. Interest rate shall be discussed if availed.
Location: Gabayan, Lazi Siquijor

                            <div class="ListingCell-shortDescription expanded">
            Nestled in the charming town of Indang, Cavite, Paglaom Daine offers a unique opportunity to embrace serene countryside living without sacrificing modern comforts.

Key Features:

  Scenic Beauty: Paglaom Daine is surrounded by the natural beauty of Indang, with lush landscapes and scenic views that change with the seasons. It's a place where you can reconnect with nature and enjoy the tranquil countryside.
  Community Harmony: Experience the warmth of a close-knit community that shares the joys of rural living. Friendly neighbors and a strong sense of community make Paglaom Daine a welcoming place to call home.
  Modern Comforts: While you'll enjoy the peace and quiet of rural life, Paglaom Daine is also conveniently close to essential amenities, schools, markets, and medical facilities, ensuring that your daily needs are met.
  Reliable Infrastructure: The community benefits from well-maintained roads, utilities, and security measures, providing you with a secure and convenient living environment.
  Investment Potential: Whether you're seeking a serene retirement spot or an investment opportunity, Paglaom Daine offers both the promise of a peaceful life and the potential for future growth.


Discover Paglaom Daine and its unique blend of countryside charm and modern convenience. It's not just a place to live; it's a place to create lasting memories and a sense of belonging in the heart of Indang, Cavite.

                            <div class="ListingCell-shortDescription ">
            Terrazas de Punta Fuego, Lots for Sale in Nasugbu Batangas

The premiere luxury seaside getaway in the Philippines
Experience a bold combination of Filipino design and hospitality with world-class luxury at Terrazas de Punta Fuego, a pristine beach destination located in the Philippine summer seaside capital of Nasugbu, Batangas.

Only a few hours south of Manila, the Terrazas de Punta Fuego was expertly crafted to be the ultimate vacation home for the discerning luxury traveler in the Philippines. Enjoy fine white sand and clear blue waters. Soak in the summer sun and feel the cool ocean breeze kiss your cheeks.

Your Terrazas de Punta Fuego home offers majestic twin views of the Batangas mountain range and the West Philippine Sea.

Every homeowner at the Terrazas de Punta Fuego community may avail of an associate membership at the very exclusive Club Punta Fuego, a premiere seaside club that allows you to enjoy a variety of seaside activities to satisfy any discerning individual.
Imagine taking a few rounds of golf or going on an early morning stroll along the nine-hole Nelson-Haworth-designed executive golf course which boasts of a majestic view of the West Philippine Sea. Indulge in aqua sports like diving, snorkeling, jet skiing and kayaking. Frolic on a private cove in one of our two beaches or take a boat out sailing. The double infinity pool overlooking Sunset Cove is perfect for an afternoon swim while enjoying the sunset. After a day full of fun activities, you can enjoy the gastronomic delights served at Caf San Diego or go al fresco in Il Jardineto at the Lower Beach Club.

Pls call to schedule site visit,

<h2 style="text-align:justify"> </h2>

<h2><img loading="lazy"alt="Farm Land for Sale" class="loaded loading" src="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/static/cms/Land_Buy_1.jpg" style="border:2px solid #dddddd; float:right; margin-left:10px; opacity:1" title="Farm Land for Sale" /><strong>Lot for Sale in the Philippines: Real Estate Investment Worth Considering</strong></h2>

<p>The old adage goes, “the best investment on earth is earth.” A <strong>lot for sale</strong> is an ideal real estate asset because its value appreciates over time given the limitedness in supply. Moreover, it’s versatile. You can use it to build your next home, rent it out to businesses, or sell it for a much higher price than you bought it for. The best thing about it is that even though you leave it as it is for years, it will still have a promising value in the market by the time you decide what to do with it.</p>

<h2><strong>Nearby Establishments</strong></h2>

<p>Most of the lots for sale in the country are in strategic locations. The residential lots are in subdivisions close to establishments offering daily essentials. Meanwhile, the commercial lots are near major road networks, promoting easy transport of goods and smooth business operations for locators.</p>

<p>A <strong>lot for sale</strong> in Metro Manila, for instance, may be a short distance from the capital region’s most popular establishments, including:</p>

<p><strong>Schools:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li><a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/landmark-university-of-the-philippines-dilimanup/land/buy/">University of the Philippines Diliman </a></li>
	<li>Ateneo de Manila University </li>
	<li><a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/landmark-university-of-santo-tomas-hospital/land/buy/">University of Santo Tomas</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/landmark-de-la-salle-university/land/buy/">De La Salle University</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/landmark-polytechnic-university-of-the-philippinespup/land/buy/">Polytechnic University of the Philippines </a></li>
	<li><a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/landmark-far-eastern-university/land/buy/">Far Eastern University</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/landmark-centro-escolar-university/land/buy/">Centro Escolar University</a></li>
	<li>Lyceum of the Philippines University</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Hospitals:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li><a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/landmark-philippine-general-hospitalpgh/land/buy/">Philippine General Hospital</a></li>
	<li>Philippine Heart Center</li>
	<li><a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/landmark-lung-center-of-the-philippines/land/buy/">Lung Center of the Philippines</a></li>
	<li>National Kidney and Transplant Institute</li>
	<li><a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/landmark-philippine-childrens-medical-centerpcmc/land/buy/">Philippine Children's Medical Center</a></li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Malls:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Glorietta </li>
	<li><a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/landmark-greenbelt-mall/land/buy/">Greenbelt </a></li>
	<li><a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/landmark-sm-megamall/land/buy/">SM Megamall </a></li>
	<li><a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/landmark-mall-of-asia-arena/land/buy/">SM Mall of Asia </a></li>
	<li><a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/landmark-sm-aura/land/buy/">SM Aura Premier </a></li>
	<li><a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/landmark-robinsons-galleria/land/buy/">Robinsons Galleria </a></li>
	<li>Gateway Mall</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Transportation Networks:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Radial Roads </li>
	<li>Circumferential Roads </li>
	<li>EDSA</li>
	<li>NAIA Expressway</li>
	<li>Skyway</li>
</ul>

<h2><strong>Average Selling Prices in the Philippines</strong></h2>

<p>The lots for sale in the Philippines come in different types: residential and commercial. Choose based on your financial goals and situation. The prices of these properties largely depend on their size and location. </p>

<p>As of February 2022, a residential <strong>lot for sale</strong> in Metro Manila with 50 to 70 square meters ranges from P3M to P5M. The price goes higher as the land gets bigger. Those located outside the metro, in suburban areas, are priced relatively cheaper. You can even find land properties at P1.5M. </p>

<p>Meanwhile, a commercial <strong>lot for sale</strong> in Metro Manila with a size of 200 to 400 square meters is worth P6M to P10M. Outside of the capital region, there are commercial lots with 250 square meters sold below P2M.</p>

<h2><strong>Why Buy a Lot in the Philippines</strong></h2>

<p>Land values, especially in the Central Business Districts (CBD) are increasing on a yearly basis. What you buy now will be worth more later–a lot more. The Makati CBD, Fort Bonifacio, and Ortigas Center are property hotspots worth considering when buying a lot for sale in the Philippines. Prices in these areas, as well as in other major parts of Metro Manila, such as Quezon City, Muntinlupa, Manila, and Parañaque are expected to increase from 6% to 12% in the next coming years.</p>

<h2 style="text-align:justify"><strong>Investment/Business/Work Opportunities</strong><br />
<img loading="lazy"alt="Beach Lot for Sale" class="loaded" src="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/static/cms/Land_Buy_2.jpg" style="border:2px solid #dddddd; float:left; margin-left:5px; margin-right:10px; opacity:1" title="Beach Lot for Sale" /></h2>

<p>The Philippines has one of the fastest-growing economies in all of Asia. Based on the International Monetary Fund 2021, the Philippine economy is ranked 27th in terms of nominal gross domestic product. In fact, the country saw an 11.8% increase in GDP in the second quarter of 2021. The last similar growth rate of 11.99% was recorded back in 1988. </p>

<p>The country is known for exporting garments, petroleum products, fruits, and coconut oil. Another major factor that influences the growth of the Philippine economy is tourism. Millions of local and foreign tourists visit natural tourist destinations like beaches, mountains, rainforests, islands, and heritage sites annually. The number of foreign visitors reached its peak in 2018, with over 8 million tourists. </p>

<p>If you invest in a <strong>lot for sale</strong> in the Philippines, you can benefit from the country’s growing economy. Buying residential land and building your dream home in a progressive location will help you be exposed to promising career opportunities. You get to live your dream job and support your growing family without the compromise of being away from them. </p>

<p>On the other hand, buying commercial land in a property hotspot in the Philippines will yield in excellent passive income and returns. It can expand your professional network as well, as you cater to different types of businesses.</p>

<h2><strong>Frequently Asked Questions</strong></h2>

<p><strong><em>Are there any agricultural lots for sale?</em></strong></p>

<p>Yes, you can find<a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/land/agricutural-lot/buy/"><strong> agricultural lots for sale</strong></a>. The Philippines has some of the most fertile agricultural lands in the world, making these lots an excellent investment. </p>

<p><strong><em>Are there cheap residential lots for sale?</em></strong></p>

<p>Yes, depending on your budget, there are a lot of <a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/land/residential-lot/buy/price:0-100000/"><strong>cheap residential lots for sale</strong></a>. These lots can cost less than Php 100,000 and can perfectly accommodate a house.</p>

<p><strong><em>Are there any beach lots for sale in the Philippines?</em></strong></p>

<p>Yes, there are so many<a href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/land/beach-lot/buy/"><strong> beach lots for sale</strong></a>. As the Philippines is a tropical country, its beaches are some of the most beautiful in the world. These lots for sale are good for developing private vacation houses or commercial resort developments. </p>
